EmailTemplate.name: VHM-Appliance-Nurture6.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor: Can We Help?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We noticed that you haven’t activated the FREE Virtual Health Monitor you downloaded. We’d like to help, if we can.
If you are lacking the information needed to take the next step, you can check out the installation guide <http://bit.ly/170DBGg>, or contact us <mailto:sales@vmturbo.com> for assistance.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
VMTurbo
